title: Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Marunouchi Announces Four Seasons App Upgrade Extending Mobile Services to hotels in Asia pacificTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Marunouchi Announces Four Seasons App Upgrade Extending Mobile Services to hotels in Asia pacific Published on : Saturday, September 5, 2015
Travellers to Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Marunouchi can now check in and check out on the go, as well as access a host of other functions such as ordering in room dining and requesting items from housekeeping through the Hotel Services feature with the latest release of the Four Seasons App.
Launched earlier this year, English language features across the entire Four Seasons portfolio include the ability to make and manage reservations in multiple locations at once, efficient check-in and check-out, options to make special requests in advance of arrival, and on-the-go room service orders and restaurant reservations.
“The new, multi-functional, content-rich Four Seasons App offers guests an opportunity to customise their stay on the go. With just a few taps, travellers can access a wide array of services and personal options wherever and whenever they wish,” says Takuya Kishi, Hotel Manager of Four Seasons Hotel Tokyo at Marunouchi. The Four Seasons Recommends feature has proven to be extremely popular with guests. It offers expert local recommendations for every hotel in the portfolio, including restaurants, shopping, attractions and activities sorted into “moods” to make trip planning a breeze, plus personal recommendations of hundreds of Four Seasons hotel concierges who know their destination best.
Source:-Four Seasons
